name: Saheeh International
text: By those [angels] lined up in rows

name: Saheeh International
text: And those who drive [the clouds]

name: Saheeh International
text: And those who recite the message,

name: Saheeh International
text: Indeed, your God is One,

name: Saheeh International
text: Lord of the heavens and the earth and that between them and Lord of the sunrises.

name: Saheeh International
text: Indeed, We have adorned the nearest heaven with an adornment of stars

name: Saheeh International
text: And as protection against every rebellious devil

name: Saheeh International
text: [So] they may not listen to the exalted assembly [of angels] and are pelted from every side,

name: Saheeh International
text: Repelled; and for them is a constant punishment,

name: Saheeh International
text: Except one who snatches [some words] by theft, but they are pursued by a burning flame, piercing [in brightness].

name: Saheeh International
text: Then inquire of them, [O Muhammad], "Are they a stronger [or more difficult] creation or those [others] We have created?" Indeed, We created men from sticky clay.

name: Saheeh International
text: But you wonder, while they mock,

name: Saheeh International
text: And when they are reminded, they remember not.

name: Saheeh International
text: And when they see a sign, they ridicule

name: Saheeh International
text: And say, "This is not but obvious magic.

name: Saheeh International
text: When we have died and become dust and bones, are we indeed to be resurrected?

name: Saheeh International
text: And our forefathers [as well]?"

name: Saheeh International
text: Say, "Yes, and you will be [rendered] contemptible."

name: Saheeh International
text: It will be only one shout, and at once they will be observing.

name: Saheeh International
text: They will say, "O woe to us! This is the Day of Recompense."

name: Saheeh International
text: [They will be told], "This is the Day of Judgement which you used to deny."

name: Saheeh International
text: [The angels will be ordered], "Gather those who committed wrong, their kinds, and what they used to worship

name: Saheeh International
text: Other than Allah, and guide them to the path of Hellfire

name: Saheeh International
text: And stop them; indeed, they are to be questioned."

name: Saheeh International
text: [They will be asked], "What is [wrong] with you? Why do you not help each other?"

name: Saheeh International
text: But they, that Day, are in surrender.

name: Saheeh International
text: And they will approach one another blaming each other.

name: Saheeh International
text: They will say, "Indeed, you used to come at us from the right."

name: Saheeh International
text: The oppressors will say, "Rather, you [yourselves] were not believers,

name: Saheeh International
text: And we had over you no authority, but you were a transgressing people.

name: Saheeh International
text: So the word of our Lord has come into effect upon us; indeed, we will taste [punishment].

name: Saheeh International
text: And we led you to deviation; indeed, we were deviators."

name: Saheeh International
text: So indeed they, that Day, will be sharing in the punishment.

name: Saheeh International
text: Indeed, that is how We deal with the criminals.

name: Saheeh International
text: Indeed they, when it was said to them, "There is no deity but Allah," were arrogant

name: Saheeh International
text: And were saying, "Are we to leave our gods for a mad poet?"

name: Saheeh International
text: Rather, the Prophet has come with the truth and confirmed the [previous] messengers.

name: Saheeh International
text: Indeed, you [disbelievers] will be tasters of the painful punishment,

name: Saheeh International
text: And you will not be recompensed except for what you used to do -

name: Saheeh International
text: But not the chosen servants of Allah.

name: Saheeh International
text: Those will have a provision determined -

name: Saheeh International
text: Fruits; and they will be honored

name: Saheeh International
text: In gardens of pleasure

name: Saheeh International
text: On thrones facing one another.

name: Saheeh International
text: There will be circulated among them a cup [of wine] from a flowing spring,

name: Saheeh International
text: White and delicious to the drinkers;

name: Saheeh International
text: No bad effect is there in it, nor from it will they be intoxicated.

name: Saheeh International
text: And with them will be women limiting [their] glances, with large, [beautiful] eyes,

name: Saheeh International
text: As if they were [delicate] eggs, well-protected.

name: Saheeh International
text: And they will approach one another, inquiring of each other.

name: Saheeh International
text: A speaker among them will say, "Indeed, I had a companion [on earth]

name: Saheeh International
text: Who would say, 'Are you indeed of those who believe

name: Saheeh International
text: That when we have died and become dust and bones, we will indeed be recompensed?'"

name: Saheeh International
text: He will say, "Would you [care to] look?"

name: Saheeh International
text: And he will look and see him in the midst of the Hellfire.

name: Saheeh International
text: He will say, "By Allah, you almost ruined me.

name: Saheeh International
text: If not for the favor of my Lord, I would have been of those brought in [to Hell].

name: Saheeh International
text: Then, are we not to die

name: Saheeh International
text: Except for our first death, and we will not be punished?"

name: Saheeh International
text: Indeed, this is the great attainment.

name: Saheeh International
text: For the like of this let the workers [on earth] work.

name: Saheeh International
text: Is Paradise a better accommodation or the tree of zaqqum?

name: Saheeh International
text: Indeed, We have made it a torment for the wrongdoers.

name: Saheeh International
text: Indeed, it is a tree issuing from the bottom of the Hellfire,

name: Saheeh International
text: Its emerging fruit as if it was heads of the devils.

name: Saheeh International
text: And indeed, they will eat from it and fill with it their bellies.

name: Saheeh International
text: Then indeed, they will have after it a mixture of scalding water.

name: Saheeh International
text: Then indeed, their return will be to the Hellfire.

name: Saheeh International
text: Indeed they found their fathers astray.

name: Saheeh International
text: So they hastened [to follow] in their footsteps.

name: Saheeh International
text: And there had already strayed before them most of the former peoples,

name: Saheeh International
text: And We had already sent among them warners.

name: Saheeh International
text: Then look how was the end of those who were warned -

name: Saheeh International
text: But not the chosen servants of Allah.

name: Saheeh International
text: And Noah had certainly called Us, and [We are] the best of responders.

name: Saheeh International
text: And We saved him and his family from the great affliction.

name: Saheeh International
text: And We made his descendants those remaining [on the earth]

name: Saheeh International
text: And left for him [favorable mention] among later generations:

name: Saheeh International
text: "Peace upon Noah among the worlds."

name: Saheeh International
text: Indeed, We thus reward the doers of good.

name: Saheeh International
text: Indeed, he was of Our believing servants.

name: Saheeh International
text: Then We drowned the disbelievers.

name: Saheeh International
text: And indeed, among his kind was Abraham,

name: Saheeh International
text: When he came to his Lord with a sound heart

name: Saheeh International
text: [And] when he said to his father and his people, "What do you worship?

name: Saheeh International
text: Is it falsehood [as] gods other than Allah you desire?

name: Saheeh International
text: Then what is your thought about the Lord of the worlds?"

name: Saheeh International
text: And he cast a look at the stars

name: Saheeh International
text: And said, "Indeed, I am [about to be] ill."

name: Saheeh International
text: So they turned away from him, departing.

name: Saheeh International
text: Then he turned to their gods and said, "Do you not eat?

name: Saheeh International
text: What is [wrong] with you that you do not speak?"

name: Saheeh International
text: And he turned upon them a blow with [his] right hand.

name: Saheeh International
text: Then the people came toward him, hastening.

name: Saheeh International
text: He said, "Do you worship that which you [yourselves] carve,

name: Saheeh International
text: While Allah created you and that which you do?"

name: Saheeh International
text: They said, "Construct for him a furnace and throw him into the burning fire."

name: Saheeh International
text: And they intended for him a plan, but We made them the most debased.

name: Saheeh International
text: And [then] he said, "Indeed, I will go to [where I am ordered by] my Lord; He will guide me.

name: Saheeh International
text: My Lord, grant me [a child] from among the righteous."

name: Saheeh International
text: So We gave him good tidings of a forbearing boy.

name: Saheeh International
text: And when he reached with him [the age of] exertion, he said, "O my son, indeed I have seen in a dream that I [must] sacrifice you, so see what you think." He said, "O my father, do as you are commanded. You will find me, if Allah wills, of the steadfast."

name: Saheeh International
text: And when they had both submitted and he put him down upon his forehead,

name: Saheeh International
text: We called to him, "O Abraham,

name: Saheeh International
text: You have fulfilled the vision." Indeed, We thus reward the doers of good.

name: Saheeh International
text: Indeed, this was the clear trial.

name: Saheeh International
text: And We ransomed him with a great sacrifice,

name: Saheeh International
text: And We left for him [favorable mention] among later generations:

name: Saheeh International
text: "Peace upon Abraham."

name: Saheeh International
text: Indeed, We thus reward the doers of good.

name: Saheeh International
text: Indeed, he was of Our believing servants.

name: Saheeh International
text: And We gave him good tidings of Isaac, a prophet from among the righteous.

name: Saheeh International
text: And We blessed him and Isaac. But among their descendants is the doer of good and the clearly unjust to himself.

name: Saheeh International
text: And We did certainly confer favor upon Moses and Aaron.

name: Saheeh International
text: And We saved them and their people from the great affliction,

name: Saheeh International
text: And We supported them so it was they who overcame.

name: Saheeh International
text: And We gave them the explicit Scripture,

name: Saheeh International
text: And We guided them on the straight path.

name: Saheeh International
text: And We left for them [favorable mention] among later generations:

name: Saheeh International
text: "Peace upon Moses and Aaron."

name: Saheeh International
text: Indeed, We thus reward the doers of good.

name: Saheeh International
text: Indeed, they were of Our believing servants.

name: Saheeh International
text: And indeed, Elias was from among the messengers,

name: Saheeh International
text: When he said to his people, "Will you not fear Allah?

name: Saheeh International
text: Do you call upon Ba'l and leave the best of creators -

name: Saheeh International
text: Allah, your Lord and the Lord of your first forefathers?"

name: Saheeh International
text: And they denied him, so indeed, they will be brought [for punishment],

name: Saheeh International
text: Except the chosen servants of Allah.

name: Saheeh International
text: And We left for him [favorable mention] among later generations:

name: Saheeh International
text: "Peace upon Elias."

name: Saheeh International
text: Indeed, We thus reward the doers of good.

name: Saheeh International
text: Indeed, he was of Our believing servants.

name: Saheeh International
text: And indeed, Lot was among the messengers.

name: Saheeh International
text: [So mention] when We saved him and his family, all,

name: Saheeh International
text: Except his wife among those who remained [with the evildoers].

name: Saheeh International
text: Then We destroyed the others.

name: Saheeh International
text: And indeed, you pass by them in the morning

name: Saheeh International
text: And at night. Then will you not use reason?

name: Saheeh International
text: And indeed, Jonah was among the messengers.

name: Saheeh International
text: [Mention] when he ran away to the laden ship.

name: Saheeh International
text: And he drew lots and was among the losers.

name: Saheeh International
text: Then the fish swallowed him, while he was blameworthy.

name: Saheeh International
text: And had he not been of those who exalt Allah,

name: Saheeh International
text: He would have remained inside its belly until the Day they are resurrected.

name: Saheeh International
text: But We threw him onto the open shore while he was ill.

name: Saheeh International
text: And We caused to grow over him a gourd vine.

name: Saheeh International
text: And We sent him to [his people of] a hundred thousand or more.

name: Saheeh International
text: And they believed, so We gave them enjoyment [of life] for a time.

name: Saheeh International
text: So inquire of them, [O Muhammad], "Does your Lord have daughters while they have sons?

name: Saheeh International
text: Or did We create the angels as females while they were witnesses?"

name: Saheeh International
text: Unquestionably, it is out of their [invented] falsehood that they say,

name: Saheeh International
text: " Allah has begotten," and indeed, they are liars.

name: Saheeh International
text: Has He chosen daughters over sons?

name: Saheeh International
text: What is [wrong] with you? How do you make judgement?

name: Saheeh International
text: Then will you not be reminded?

name: Saheeh International
text: Or do you have a clear authority?

name: Saheeh International
text: Then produce your scripture, if you should be truthful.

name: Saheeh International
text: And they have claimed between Him and the jinn a lineage, but the jinn have already known that they [who made such claims] will be brought to [punishment].

name: Saheeh International
text: Exalted is Allah above what they describe,

name: Saheeh International
text: Except the chosen servants of Allah [who do not share in that sin].

name: Saheeh International
text: So indeed, you [disbelievers] and whatever you worship,

name: Saheeh International
text: You cannot tempt [anyone] away from Him

name: Saheeh International
text: Except he who is to [enter and] burn in the Hellfire.

name: Saheeh International
text: [The angels say], "There is not among us any except that he has a known position.

name: Saheeh International
text: And indeed, we are those who line up [for prayer].

name: Saheeh International
text: And indeed, we are those who exalt Allah."

name: Saheeh International
text: And indeed, the disbelievers used to say,

name: Saheeh International
text: "If we had a message from [those of] the former peoples,

name: Saheeh International
text: We would have been the chosen servants of Allah."

name: Saheeh International
text: But they disbelieved in it, so they are going to know.

name: Saheeh International
text: And Our word has already preceded for Our servants, the messengers,

name: Saheeh International
text: [That] indeed, they would be those given victory

name: Saheeh International
text: And [that] indeed, Our soldiers will be those who overcome.

name: Saheeh International
text: So, [O Muhammad], leave them for a time.

name: Saheeh International
text: And see [what will befall] them, for they are going to see.

name: Saheeh International
text: Then for Our punishment are they impatient?

name: Saheeh International
text: But when it descends in their territory, then evil is the morning of those who were warned.

name: Saheeh International
text: And leave them for a time.

name: Saheeh International
text: And see, for they are going to see.

name: Saheeh International
text: Exalted is your Lord, the Lord of might, above what they describe.

name: Saheeh International
text: And peace upon the messengers.

name: Saheeh International
text: And praise to Allah, Lord of the worlds.
